snippet: The Football Factory, a bar that may seem little more than a cavern filled with glowing televisions, is among New York City’s premier houses of soccer worship.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on The Football Factory, basement bar in Midtown Manhattan that shows soccer games from around world at all times of the day.
lead_paragraph: The Football Factory, a bar that may seem little more than a cavern filled with glowing televisions, is among New York City’s premier houses of soccer worship.

headline.main: Stateside, Kicking and Screaming at the Football Factory
